meanings.definition: A person or company that broadcasts live or pre-recorded audio or video content over the internet.
meanings.sent1: The webcasters streamed a live concert online.
meanings.sent2: Many webcasters provide news updates through online videos.
meanings.sent3: The webcasters accidentally played the wrong song during the broadcast.
meanings.sent4: The webcasters' voices floated through the internet like digital waves.
meanings.sent5: The webcasters' equipment hummed softly as they prepared for the show.

meanings.definition: The act of broadcasting live or pre-recorded audio or video content over the internet.
meanings.sent1: We watched the webcasters' stream of the sports event.
meanings.sent2: The webcasters' webcast attracted a large audience.
meanings.sent3: The webcasters' broadcast suddenly cut out due to technical issues.
meanings.sent4: The webcasters' signals traveled swiftly across the web.
meanings.sent5: The webcasters' show lit up screens all around the world.
